hopobject.body:
Embedded Systems Conference

Boston 2009

BeagleBoard Workshop- Tuesday, September 22nd

Join BeagleBoard.org at ESC for a hands-on interactive day of training. You get access to industry expert led classes where you learn how to configure you kit onsite---and it’s yours to keep!

Sessions are Free

Purchase your kit now! You can add a BeagleBoard to ANY ESC registration package for $299.

Already have a BeagleBoard from last year’s event? Pay an additional $99 for your 2009 set up (including cables, monitor station and all BeagleBoard accessories). This option can be added to any ESC registration package.

Attendees are encouraged to bring their laptops and a USB-to-serial adapter, which is available for sale at the show, to the classes for easy bring-up the BeagleBoard. The minds behind BeagleBoard, Jason Kridner and Gerald Coley, will be in the workshop Tuesday morning for those that would like to bring-up their boards before the classes kick-off. Workshop presentations can be downloaded prior to the classes at http://beagleboard.org/esc.

Note : BeagleBoard registration package additions are available in the STEP 3 portion of ESC registration.

Have ideas and projects you want to share with other BeagleBoard developers? Stick around after the classes and join BeagleBoard.org for drinks at the Users Group meeting after the classes. Location TBD.

TUESDAY
BeagleBoard 101 Workshop
Speaker: Gerald Coley (Systems Engineer, Texas Instruments) & Jason Kridner (Principal Architect, Texas Instruments)
Date/Time: Tuesday (September 22, 2009) 12:30pm — 2:30pm
Location (room): 200
https://www.cmpevents.com/ESCe09/a.asp?option=C&V=11&SessID=10076

Run Android on your BeagleBoard
Speaker: Bill Gatliff
Date/Time: Tuesday (September 22, 2009) 2:45pm — 4:00pm
Location (room): 200
https://www.cmpevents.com/ESCe09/a.asp?option=C&V=11&SessID=10079

Embedded Streaming Media with Gstreamer
Speaker: Santiago Nunez (RidgeRun)
Date/Time: Tuesday (September 22, 2009) 4:15pm — 5:30pm
Location (room): 200
https://www.cmpevents.com/ESCe09/a.asp?option=C&V=11&SessID=10078

Introduction to Creating 3D UI with the BeagleBoard
Speaker: TBD
Date/Time: Tuesday (September 22, 2009) 5:45pm — 7:00pm
Location (room): 200
https://www.cmpevents.com/ESCe09/a.asp?option=C&V=11&SessID=10077

Silicon Valley 2009

Silicon Valley 2009 Build Your Own Embedded System track

Slides

  • ESC-120: BeagleBoard 101
  • ESC-140: 3D User Interface
  • ESC-160: Kill Bugs
  • ESC-180: Bluetooth
  • ESC-228: GStreamer
  • ESC-268: Android

Image
